message.entry: When 2 input arguments are specified, the first argument must be an axes.
Invalid or deleted graphics object.
When the first input argument is a vector of axes, the axes must all be of the same type.
{0} is not supported for polar axes.
{0} is not supported for polar axes. Use {1} instead.
{0} is not supported for Cartesian axes. Use {1} instead.
{0} is not supported for colorbars.
{0} is not supported for categorical rulers.
When specifying numeric values, enclose the input arguments in parentheses.
Limits must be a 2-element vector of increasing numeric values.
Limits must be a 2-element vector of increasing datetime values.
Limits must be a 2-element vector of increasing durations.
Limits must be a 2-element vector of increasing or equal categories as ordered by the ruler Categories property.
Specify a two-element vector or one of the following options: 'mode', 'auto', 'manual', 'method', 'tickaligned', 'tight', or 'padded'.
Specify limits or one of the 'mode', 'auto', 'manual' options.
Invalid tick values. To set tick labels use {0}.
Tick values must be a vector of increasing numeric values.
Tick values must be a vector of increasing datetime values.
Tick values must be a vector of increasing durations.
Tick values must be a vector of increasing categorical values.
Specify tick values or one of the following options: 'mode', 'auto', 'manual'.
Specify tick labels as cell array of character vectors, string array, or one of the 'mode', 'auto', or 'manual' options.
Rotation must be a scalar angle in degrees.
Invalid numeric tick label format.
Invalid date or time format.
Invalid duration format.
Invalid scale value. To set ruler scaling use values of 'linear' or 'log'.
